attributes.action: use certain prisoners(those that have taken another life) as organ donors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With DNA testing&forensics being 99.9% accurate.Build special prison/hospitals solely for collecting human organs for transplanting which would benefit the public all round and act as a deterrent to those whom deem life to be cheap. it would also free up congested prisons and ease the burden on the tax payer.
